about_the_game:
Join Orin and The Rust Wanderers in their battle against the relentless forces of the Dominant Hand. Take the fight to The Baron and free The Slaglands from his cold iron grip! The innocent bots of the Slaglands live in fear of their Dominant Hand overlords and are under threat of being scraped! Give the Dominant Hand a taste of their own medicine! Gather THEIR Scrap and grow in power on your quest to rid The Slaglands from the clutches of the Dominant Hand.

Find your captured friends and free them from the grasp of the Dominant Hand! After rescuing and some repairs they will join you on the battlefield, bringing their experience and powerful new weapons with them. Each rust wanderer has their own traits and excel at different things. Use this to your advantage!

Enjoy thousands of possible loadouts, discovering which combos pack the most punch and fit your play style best! While out in the Slaglands keep your optical receptors powered up and on the lookout for valuable QBits, the currency of the land that you can bring back with you and use towards powerful permanent upgrades.

The successful scrap runner is always on the lookout for the best tools for the job. Experiment with loadouts to discover and wield powerful combo weapons that can change the tide of any battle!

As you grow in strength venture deeper into the Slaglands in search of The Baron across six giant maps, laying waste to the bots that took your friends and pushed you out of your home, but beware the violent and brutal Baron who owns these lands and leads the Dominant Hand. Your spree of destruction and liberation will only go on so long until you will have to face one of the Barons ruthless lieutenants. Scrap them or be scrapped. Take the fight to the Baron and stop him before his plans come to fruition!

Note from the Developer:

As a small studio of passionate gamers, we understand that your money and game time are both important and precious to you. We're the same way, and always want to make sure that our purchase decisions are well informed. With that said, through testing we've found that the full play time to beat the game is somewhere between 7 and 9 hours for the average player. This does not include unlocking everything in the game. Unlocking everything in the game will bring that play time north of 12 to 15 hours.

highlighted.name: A dump at the end of the universe

The innocent bots of the Slaglands live in fear of their Dominant Hand overlords and are under threat of being scraped! Give the Dominant Hand a taste of their own medicine! Each rust wanderer has their own traits and excel at different things. Use this to your advantage!

Enjoy thousands of possible loadouts, discovering which combos pack the most punch and fit your play style best! While out in the Slaglands keep your optical receptors powered up and on the lookout for valuable QBits, the currency of the land that you can bring back with you and use towards powerful permanent upgrades.

name: Scrap Age: Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Orin and The Rust Wanderers in their battle against the relentless forces of the Dominant Hand. Take the fight to The Baron and his Dominant Hand Forces to free The Slaglands from his cold iron grip! Gather Scrap and grow in power on your quest to rescue your friends and gain your independence.
